title: Full Stack Developer
job_function: Information Technology, Engineering, and Project Management
description:
Future\\-Able is looking for a Full Stack Developer, a full\\-time contract role, to work for:
 



  





 Naked \\& Thriving \\- An organic, botanical skincare brand focused on helping everyone realize a healthy\\-looking glow. Products are naturally derived, vegan, cruelty\\-free, and free from synthetic ingredients, and we’re committed to sustainable and green business practices every step of the way. With 8 years of experience in the USA market, we're all about clean, effective skincare. As we rapidly grow and expand into new categories, channels, and countries, customer satisfaction remains our top priority. If you're an A\\-player with an entrepreneurial spirit and you're passionate about moving beauty towards a sustainable future, we'd love to have you on this journey with us.
 



  





**Position Overview:** 




 As a Full Stack developer, you should be comfortable around both front\\-end and back\\-end coding languages. You will play a pivotal role in developing solutions for fast growing e\\-commerce platforms. You should also be a team player with a knack of developing code with a test\\-driven approach.
 



**Responsibilities:** 



* Work with development teams and product manager to ideate solutions.
* Design solutions for e\\-commerce platform
* Build the front\\-end of applications through appealing visual design
* Develop and manage well\\-functioning web portal on SHOPIFY platform
* Writing effective APIs
* Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
* Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
* Build features and applications for a multi factor platform
* Write technical documentation



**Qualifications and Skills:** 



* 4\\-6 years of proven experience as a full stack developer and similar role.
* Knowledge of front end languages (HTML/CSS/JavasSript/Jquery/XML/Liquid)
* Experience in Shopify
* Knowledge of back end languages is good to have.
* 2\\-3 years of experience in Angular/React/Node JS
* Familiarity with databases (MongoDB/MySql) and web servers
* Highly skilled in UI/UX design and attention to details.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross\\-functional teams.
* Prior experience in e\\-commerce required.



  





**Compensation and Benefits:** 



* USD Salary \\- $24,000 \\-$30,000 per year equivalent
* 100% remote
* The possibility of being selected for annual bonuses based on business performance and personal achievements



  





  





 \\#Hiring \\#FullStackDeveloper \\#ShopifyDeveloper \\#EcommerceDevelopment \\#WebDevelopment \\#RemoteWork \\#TechJobs \\#CleanBeauty
 



  





 Follow Future\\-Able on LinkedIn to stay updated on contract and full\\-time opportunities across technology and marketing.

title: AI/ML Engineer – Research & Model Development
description:
**Role Overview:** 




**We are seeking an AI/ML Engineer** 
 to drive the development of machine learning models for robotics\\-driven research and automation. You will design and fine\\-tune models that process multimodal data (vision, language, robotic sensor data) and leverage simulation environments for large\\-scale training and validation. This is a
 **full\\-time, on\\-site role in Chennai** 
 .
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop, train, and fine\\-tune machine learning models for robotics and automation tasks.
* Build multimodal AI pipelines (vision, language, sensor data).
* Work with simulation frameworks (e.g., MuJoCo, Isaac Gym, PyBullet) to train and test models.
* Optimize data processing pipelines for experimental and synthetic datasets.
* Collaborate with the robotics team to integrate AI models into real\\-world workflows.
* Document models, experiments, and results for research dissemination.
* Stay updated with advancements in embodied AI, reinforcement learning, and simulation\\-to\\-reality transfer.



**Qualifications:** 



* Bachelor’s/Master’s/ PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related fields.
* **Minimum 1 year of experience** 
 in AI/ML research or software development.
* Priority is given if you have published in reputed journals and conferences
* Strong programming skills in Python and ML frameworks (PyTorch, JAX, TensorFlow).
* Hands\\-on experience in deep learning, computer vision, or reinforcement learning.
* Familiarity with robotics simulation environments (MuJoCo, Isaac Gym, PyBullet, Webots, or Gazebo).
* Experience with sim\\-to\\-real transfer or embodied AI is a plus.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a fast\\-paced R\\&D environment.

title: Senior AWS Connect Developer
description:
Our client is looking for a skilled and experienced
 **Senior AWS Connect Developer** 
 to design, develop, and administer their cloud\\-based contact center solutions for a 3 month contract role.
 



  





 The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating scalable, automated, and customer\\-centric systems that enhance the overall contact center experience. The position demands a strong grasp of AWS infrastructure, contact flow design, and integration capabilities to deliver seamless and intelligent customer interactions.
 



  





**Responsibilities \\& Deliverables** 



* **AWS Service Integration** 
 : Develop and maintain Lambda functions, Lex bots, and API integrations to support dynamic and personalized customer interactions.
* **Automation \\& Optimization** 
 : Build API\\-driven automation workflows to streamline operations and improve agent efficiency.
* **IVR/CTI Customization** 
 : Customize IVR systems and CTI integrations to support advanced call handling and reporting features.
* **System Administration** 
 : Manage and monitor AWS resources including DynamoDB, S3, and Lambda to ensure high availability and performance.
* **Collaboration \\& Documentation** 
 : Work closely with cross\\-functional teams (DevOps, Support, Product) and maintain clear documentation of system architecture and workflows.



  





**Skills \\& Competencies** 



* **AWS Administration Skills** 
 : Skilled in designing and developing cloud\\-based contact center solutions using
 **Amazon Connect** 
 .
* **Technical Proficiency** 
 : Proficient in configuring
 **contact flows** 
 ,
 **Lambda integrations** 
 , and
 **API\\-driven automation** 
 .
* **Hands\\-on Experience** 
 : Extensive experience with
 **AWS services** 
 (
 **Lambda** 
 ,
 **Lex** 
 ,
 **DynamoDB** 
 ,
 **S3** 
 ) and
 **IVR/CTI customization** 
 to deliver scalable customer experience solutions.

title: AI Full Stack Developer
description:
**Full Stack Developer with AI Automation Experience** 




**Monthly Earnings: 7\\-12 LPA** 




**Project based earnings** 




  





 We’re only looking for developers whose output and thinking already match this tier.
 



 If you can’t already ship at this level, please don’t apply.
 



  





**ABOUT SENDORA AI:** 




 Sendora is the first
 **Agentic AI Revenue Infrastructure** 
 — a scaling partner for high\\-output B2B teams.
 



 We build autonomous outbound sales engines that run across LinkedIn, email, SMS, and voice. Our multi\\-agent AI systems coordinate like full SDR teams — researching prospects, personalizing outreach, handling replies, and booking meetings — while improving themselves every 48–72 hours through reinforcement learning.
 



 Clients work with us not for dashboards or templates, but for a living AI infrastructure that thinks, learns, and scales with them. We have generated more than $5M in pipeline and saved clients thousands of SDR hours by building AI systems that operate continuously.
 



  





**What you'll do:** 




 – Design, maintain, and scale
 **n8n\\-based AI workflows** 
 that drive outbound sales automation.
 



 – Build integrations across CRMs, LinkedIn, email, Slack, Retell, Supabase, and other core systems.
 



 – Develop intuitive UIs and dashboards that make complex AI\\-driven workflows simple and accessible.
 



 – Translate sales strategies into robust, automated pipelines that run across multiple channels.
 



 – Iterate rapidly using AI\\-first development tools and methodologies (Cursor, Copilot, v0\\.dev, etc.).
 



 – Own features end\\-to\\-end, from architecture and design through testing, deployment, and optimization.
 



  





**YOU'RE A STRONG FIT IF YOU:** 




 – Have built and shipped
 **real n8n workflows at scale** 
 , not just small demos.
 



 – Can debug, optimize, and extend automation infrastructure under real\\-world conditions.
 



 – Use AI tools daily as part of your development process and treat them as core accelerators.
 



 – Have experience with full\\-stack development in modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks.
 



 – Are skilled at connecting APIs, managing authentication, and handling complex data flows.
 



 – Move quickly, adapt to new requirements, and are comfortable owning outcomes.
 



  





**WHAT WE OFFER:** 




 – A full\\-time position with equity participation.
 



 – An AI\\-first culture where we run on the same infrastructure we deliver to clients.
 



 – Direct influence on product evolution, client impact, and company growth.
 



 – Remote\\-friendly structure with flexible working hours.
 



  





  





 Each step is evaluated.
 



 Each step is mandatory.
 



 No shortcuts.
 



  





 This Role Is For People Who:
 



  





 \\- Want full visibility
 



 \\- Are ready to think deeply, build fast, and speak clearly
 



 \\- Prefer pressure over comfort, clarity over vagueness, and results over hierarchy
 



 \\- Thrive on responsibility and impact not just code
 



  





 If you're serious about your craft and confident in your ability, apply now.
 



  





**NEXT STEPS:** 




 If you are ready to help build the world’s first agentic AI sales infrastructure and become part of a team redefining how outbound sales scales, apply here: https://www.sendora.ai/careers/senior\\-full\\-stack\\-developer
 



  





 P.S \\- DO NOT APPLY IF YOU CAN NOT MEET ALL THE REQUIREMENTS AS MENTIONED ABOVE, TIME IS A COMMON BUT PRECIOUS ASSET, UTILIZE IT WISELY.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**Senior Data Engineer \\- Azure Stack** 




**Experience \\- 3\\-12 years** 




**Location : Bangalore, Kolkata, Gurgaon, Pune** 




  





  





 We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Data Engineer with deep expertise in Azure Stack to join our growing team. As a Senior Data Engineer, you will be instrumental in designing and developing robust data pipelines, data lakes, and cloud\\-based solutions to support our business intelligence and analytics initiatives. You will work in a hybrid cloud environment to manage data services, ensuring high scalability, security, and performance for data\\-driven decision\\-making.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 · Data Engineering: Design and implement scalable data pipelines, ETL workflows, and processing frameworks within Azure Stack and hybrid cloud environments.
 



 · Cloud Architecture: Leverage the capabilities of Azure Stack, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse Analytics, and other Azure cloud services to integrate, manage, and optimize enterprise data solutions.
 



 · Data Integration \\& Storage: Build and optimize data lakes, data warehouses, and cloud\\-based storage systems on Azure, integrating structured and unstructured data from multiple sources.
 



 · Performance Optimization: Continuously improve data pipelines for performance, scalability, and cost\\-efficiency. Implement automation and monitoring solutions to ensure smooth operation.
 



 · Cross\\-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, data scientists, and business intelligence teams to implement data models, data visualizations, and analytics solutions.
 



 · Mentorship: Provide mentorship and technical leadership to junior engineers, helping them improve their skills in cloud data technologies, coding standards, and engineering best practices.
 



 · Cloud Migration: Assist in the migration of on\\-premises data infrastructure to Azure Stack, working closely with infrastructure teams to ensure a seamless transition.
 



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 




 · Experience: 3\\-12 years of experience in data engineering, with at least 2\\+ years of experience working specifically with Azure Stack and Azure cloud services in a hybrid environment.
 



 · Azure Stack Expertise: Proficient in Azure Stack Hub, Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Database, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure Blob Storage.
 



 · Programming Skills: Proficiency in SQL, Python, or similar scripting languages for building data pipelines and processing large datasets.
 



 · ETL Tools: Experience with building and optimizing ETL workflows using Azure Data Factory, Apache Airflow, or other similar tools.
 



 · Data Integration: Experience working with data integration tools, including both structured and unstructured data sources, and technologies such as Kafka, Spark, Hadoop, or others.
 



 · Data Warehousing \\& Storage: Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts (e.g., star/snowflake schemas) and expertise with Azure Data Lakes and SQL/NoSQL storage solutions.
 



 · Big Data Technologies: Familiarity with big data technologies like Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark, Databricks, and Kafka is a plus.
 



  





**Soft Skills:** 




 · Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving abilities.
 



 · Strong communication skills to articulate technical details to non\\-technical stakeholders.
 



 · Ability to work collaboratively in a distributed team environment.
 



 · Self\\-motivated, proactive, and able to work under minimal supervision.
 



 · Strong attention to detail, ensuring data quality and security.

title: Engineering, AVP - Deutsche Bank
description:
**Job Title:** 
**Engineering**
**Location: Pune, India**
**Corporate Title: AVP**
**Role Description**
 The Senior Engineer designs and implements technical solutions and configures applications in different environments in response to business problems. With the partial/ full ownership of Production platforms, Senior Engineer is required to ensure environment stability, expeditious and timely resolution of Production issues, ensuring minimal downtimes and continuity of services. Further the Senior Engineer investigates, proposes and implements various solutions, standardizing where possible, to ensures stability and reliability of the application platforms. The person performing the role may lead delivery of other members of the team and controls their work where applicable.
   

  

**What We'll Offer You**
 As part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that you'll enjoy
   

  

* Best in class leave policy
* Gender neutral parental leaves
* 100% reimbursement under childcare assistance benefit (gender neutral)
* Sponsorship for Industry relevant certifications and education
* Employee Assistance Program for you and your family members
* Comprehensive Hospitalization Insurance for you and your dependents
* Accident and Term life Insurance
* Complementary Health screening for 35 yrs. and above


**Your key responsibilities**
* Design and develop new functionality
* Working with the team on functional and non\\-functional requirements, technical analysis and design
* Coding and testing, reviewing other team member's changes. Unit test automation of new and existing functionality for maximum code coverage.
* Document business and functional requirements, design decisions and API
* Co\\-working with QA team on test automation of new and existing functionality
* Contribute to the definition of the future state of the system architecture
* Strong knowledge on GoldenSource product or similar EDM products.
* Good understanding of Security market domain will be added value
* Able to manage a small team to mentor them for development and delivery


**Your skills and experience**
* 8 to 15 years of proven experience with must have Goldensource 8\\.x experience for more than 5 years
* Additional Working experience/Knowledge of Any other EDM product will be preferred.
* Good understanding of product specific components like Mapping designer, GS datamodel, Connectors, GSO, Business rule development , workflow and UI.
* Proficiency in Oracle or any other Sql Language for writing complex queries and oracle stored procedures/functions. Any experience in Database Performance tuning would be highly preferred.
* Proficient in Agile Development and understanding/knowledge of JIRA
* Good understanding of Java and Unix is preferred.
* Strong desire to build, sense of ownership, urgency and drive.
* Excellent, verbal and written communication skills.
* Sound knowledge of JSON, and XML to JSON transformation.
* Prior experience working in a CI/CD environment with TeamCity/Jenkins is preferred.
* Additional Working experience/Knowledge of GoldenSource product will be preferred.
* Experience working in an agile team, practicing Scrum, Kanban or XP
* Exposure to Cloud platforms like GCP/AWS/Azure is good to have.
* Exposure to frameworks like Junit, Mockito, Cucumber etc. for implementation and unit testing.
* Ability to produce well\\-tested, documented, high\\-performance code to tight schedules


**EXPECTATIONS:**
 There are a number of common expectations that all experts should demonstrate over and above their technical/specialist contribution. These are also important for reinforcing our Deutsche Bank Values and Beliefs:
   

  

* Acts as role model for individuals aspiring to follow an expert career path by passionately promoting the merits of expert roles and the contribution of their Profession.
* Challenges the 'status quo' and influences key stakeholders to ensure industry best practice is adhered to within their area of expertise.
* Take E2E Accountability and ownership of work/projects and execute projects.
* Mentors individuals across the Bank who wish to follow an expert career path through sharing their experience, expertise and insight.
* Acts as training 'faculty' on key internal technical/specialist development programmes (annual number of hours/days to be agreed at start of year with Manager in consultation with the Profession Owner).
* Designs innovative, sustainable solutions which are congruent with the strategic direction of the Bank. Challenges colleagues to do the same, pushing the boundaries of what is possible to deliver potential for higher levels of organisational performance.
* Builds, captures and manages the transfers of knowledge across the Professional community.
* Provides Profession Owners with input that shapes the curriculum.
* Defines and implements best practices, solutions and standards related to their area of expertise.
* Demonstrates thought leadership through seeking out opportunities to shape the agenda with Regulators, Government Departments and Professional bodies.
* Cultivates and maintains effective working relationships with stakeholders and clients by articulating the contribution, commercial impact and benefits of expert roles.


**EDUCATION/CERTIFICATION:**
 Bachelor of Science degree from an accredited college or university with a concentration in Computer Science or Software Engineering (or equivalent) \\- with a minor in Finance, Mathematics or Engineering preferred.
   

  

**How We'll Support You**
* Training and development to help you excel in your career
* Coaching and support from experts in your team
* A culture of continuous learning to aid progression
* A range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs


**About us and our teams**
 Please visit our company website for further information:
   

  

**https://www.db.com/company/company.htm**
 We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.
   

  

 Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.
   

  

 We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.

title: Alteryx Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Office Solution, established in 2012, is a global consulting and AI powerhouse, offering specialized services in Outsourced Product Development, Business Process Management, and Custom Application Development \\& Maintenance. As an Authorized Microsoft Partner, we deliver exceptional value to our clients by creating tailored solutions with cutting\\-edge technologies like D3, React, and TypeScript. With an impressive track record spanning the United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Europe, and Dubai, we have transformed businesses' data potential through our AI\\-enabled tools and commitment to quality and timeliness. Office Solution empowers businesses with visually captivating and insightful data representations, facilitating informed decision\\-making.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time remote role for an Alteryx Developer. The Alteryx Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying Alteryx workflows, conducting data analysis, and generating reports. The role includes collaborating with business stakeholders to understand requirements, optimizing data processes, and maintaining data integrity and quality across various systems. The developer will ensure efficient data integration and transformation, utilizing Alteryx Designer and Server tools.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong background in Computer Science and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development
* Proficiency in Programming languages such as Python, SQL, and others
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks
* Familiarity with data visualization tools like Power BI, Tableau, or similar
* Knowledge of data integration and ETL processes
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field

title: Unix-Oracle Production support Engineer- Assistant Manager - State Street Corporation
description:
Job Title: Application Development / Maintenance\\- Senior Associate
   

  

 The job role is part of a Global Technology Support function within SSGA IT that supports the firm's public facing websites, critical client reporting applications and BPM processes. A candidate in this position needs to have proven track record of supporting complex multi\\-tier enterprise applications with a wide variety of technology stack. Candidate should have very good command in Java, Spring boot, JS, SQL/PLSQL and very good understanding of ITIL concepts, effective problem solving and analytical skills in addition to having good business communications.
   

  

 He / she would be involved in working on small development projects, along with the fixes required as part of resolving production issues (L3\\). He/She need to support day\\-to\\-day technical support and operations ensuring effective turn around on production issues faced across multiple applications at the same time with different levels of priorities. A person in this role would need to demonstrate effective problem solving skills across concerns like Infrastructure, Data Supply, content publishing and content generation, application issues or user concerns. The position is based in Bangalore and is part of a Global technical support and delivery team.
   

  

**Education And Experience \\-**
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent engineering discipline. (BE, B.Tech, MCA) Preferable : 7\\-10 years of strong technical industry experience with below mentioned technology skills
   

  

**The Technology skills expected to perform in this role are listed as follows \\-**
**MUST HAVE**
 Candidate should have sound Knowledge and hands on experience on Java8, Springboot, CoreJava, Java Script.
 **Candidate should have experience and should be ready to work on Production support assignments.** 
 Candidate should have experience in working with
 **L3/Problem management OR the candidate should be ready to work on minor development fixes as SME.** 
 Strong
 **debugging/ Problem investigation skill** 
 ; candidate would be required to debug application functionality in the process of resolving problems or tactical fixes to code. Sound
 **database skills in Oracle** 
 ; should be able to write complex SQL queries or debug them effectively, preparing tactical fixes to address urgent business requests or problems. Good knowledge in
 **Unix / Linux, shell or PERL scripting** 
 and able to run ad\\-hoc commands and developing scripts to automate batch processing.
   

  

**GOOD TO HAVE**
 Working knowledge on Python development and React JS is a plus. Working knowledge of integrating with SOAP/REST API back\\-end services or API manager like WSO2\\. Working knowledge of developing and deploying code in a CI/CD (BitBucket/Jenkins) landscape General concepts of Security, Authentication, Networking, Load Balancers, CDN, etc as required for troubleshooting incidents
   

  

 GoodGood understanding of middleware/container technologies like WebLogic, jBoss and related technology Experience in AEM (Adobe Experience Manager) or similar CMS (Content Management System) technologies is a plus. Experience with monitoring solutions like Dynatrace, Splunk or similar industry tool is a plus Working knowledge in
 **Workfront Fusion** 
 is a plus.
   

  

**Related Skills And Expectations \\-**
 Sound concepts and understanding of Life Cycle \\- Change Management, Problem management, Incident management. Preferable to have experience in
 **ServiceNow** 
 . Coordinating with Infrastructure support teams,
 **resolving production issues** 
 affecting our critical applications
 **caused by outages** 
 on network, servers and other Infrastructure components like Autosys batch processing Willingness to be able to attend to weekend support on a rostering basis; sense of ownership to be able to attend to
 **P1/Critical outages 24\\*7\\.** 
 Able to Manage Execution...should possess very good communication skills both verbal and written; ability to call for meetings and
 **drive projects and conference calls to resolve issues** 
 . Should be effective in managing business expectations as
 **First line of Defense** 
 .
   

  

 Should be contributing to the
 **Digital technology Future** 
 state by thinking, participation in projects, owning technology areas, demonstrating leadership and long term thinking.
   

  

 Constantly work to enhance the
 **automated monitoring using Dynatrace, Splunk** 
 and other tools for engineer a
 **secured and resilient** 
 eco system for applications and websites.
   

  

 Should comply with
 **corporate standards and procedures** 
 ; stay compliant with all mandatory trainings on time
   

  

 Part of a global team spread in multiple locations providing coverage across time zones and regions.
